content: magic_ring birb is a free crochet pattern originally published to my instagram totally_stitchcraft other materials needed - tapestry needle - scissors - safety eyes 12 mm or size of your choice - stuffing i e polyfill magic_ring birb was made with bernat blanket white and bernat blanket country blue as well as a small amount of yarn bee velvety smooth in mustard beak and legs you can make magic_ring birb in any weight yarn in any color the pattern is the same but the hook size and amount of yarn will differ if you make your own magic_ring birb feel free to share your work with me on instagram by tagging me @totally_stitchcraft i love to see your work
